A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Audience reviews are mostly useless. Adding this one mostly to offset the stupidity reflected by the current 55% audience score while Justice League's is 79%.  

Star Wars: The Last Jedi is the most emotionally wrenching of all Star Wars tod ate. As we all should have guessed\, it's gorgeous and the animals cute beyond reason. What moved me most are the characters\, their bravery\, and their willingness to give everything for what they think is right. 

If you want to be pissed for stupid\, made-up reasons that say more about you than the movie\, go ahead and read people complaining about rubber chickens and Mary Poppins and nod your head. If you're a fan of Star Wars\, watch the movie and have a great time.
